            "repo_name": "chromium",
            "repo_owner": "chromium",
            "message": "Revert "Add callback and logging for PdfSearchify feature promo."

This reverts commit 36ed96ad337392c7193749adc14ad4c60325de43.

Reason for revert: This change was done to collect logs on Canary. Not needed anymore.

Original change's description:
> Add callback and logging for PdfSearchify feature promo.
>
> PDF Searchify promo is not shown on Mac releases. To investigate the
> issue, add logging feature promo trigger and result.
>
